node.title: Child dies, several critically injured after jumping castle blown into air at school
node.alt: Blue tarpaulin shield at Hillcrest Primary
node.description: Children fell from as high as 10 metres after wind pickedÂ up a jumping castle and threw it into the air at an end-of-year activity day at a Tasmanian primary school.
node.content:
["A child has died and several others are in a critical condition after wind picked up a jumping castle and threw it into the air at an end-of-year activity day at a Tasmanian primary school.", "Several children fell\u00a0from a height of 10 metres, causing serious injuries, when wind\u00a0blew the jumping castle into the air at Hillcrest Primary School in Devonport, in the state's north-west.", "\"A\u00a0wind event caused a jumping castle to lift into the air,\" Tasmanian police said in a statement.", "\"Several children fell from a height of about 10 metres around 10am and are currently receiving medical treatment at the scene as well as in hospitals.", "\"Sadly, one child has died and a number of others are critical.\"", "Police said no further details about the fatality could be released at this stage for privacy reasons.\u00a0", "", "
Police officers comfort each other at the scene of the fatal accident.(ABC News: Monte Bovill)
", "As\u00a0well as multiple ambulances sent to the school, several helicopters also went to the scene to take\u00a0the injured to various hospitals.", "It is not yet known how many children have been injured.", "Police will hold a media conference to give updates early this afternoon.", "Witnesses said it was a very confronting scene with police and parents rushing towards the school.", "Police have been seen crying and embracing at the scene and many parents arrived at the school not knowing if their child had been affected.", "", "
The school has closed for the rest of the day.(ABC News: Monte Bovill)
", "", "
Parents were asked to collect their children after the incident.(ABC News: Monte Bovill)
", "Blue tarps were erected\u00a0near the tree where the jumping castle came to a rest, close to the school oval.", "People are being asked\u00a0to avoid the area.", "The school was running an end-of-year \"Big Day In\" celebration instead of a usual school picnic.", "", "
Emergency workers at the scene were visibly upset.(ABC News: Monte Bovill)
", "", "
Several helicopters ferried injured children to hospital.(ABC News: Monte Bovill)
", "Tasmania's Premier Peter Gutwein was at a COVID-19 press conference in Hobart just after the incident.", "He described it as \"serious\".", "\"My thoughts are obviously with the people involved but obviously the parents of the children that have been injured and with the emergency services,\" he said.", "\"As we receive further information on what I understand is a very serious matter we'll provide that as the day progresses.\"", "", "
The jumping castle came to rest in a tree.(ABC News: Monte Bovill)
"]
